thread.section_title: Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stunning property
thread.title_full: Stunning property - Review of Saint James Paris - Relais et Chateaux, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: damquat
title: Stunning property
text: I stayed here for work. Although the area is very residential it was about a 15 minute walk to some decent restaurant and bars. I stayed in a below ground room that was very spacious and clearly recently updated. It also had cool art. The bar at the hotel was cool. The propery itself was beautiful. I would totally recommend this hotel for a visit to Paris assuming you were looking for something quiet and out of the action.
